comments.raw_text: Why is having hooks into docshell build artifacts from toolkit/library any better than just having docshell/build produce something that gets linked in via staticlibs/?  I understand there's precdent for toolkit/library reaching into other directories, but it's not obvious to me that decision is desirable.
